channel.title: Two for Tunestr Music Playlist
channel.description: Every music reference from Two for Tunestr

item.title: It's A 3- Peat
item.description: It's a 3-peat on this episode of Two For Tunestr, featuring these value-4-value musician's from around the globe: Ben Jonesy Jones: A new release and two favorites from his catalogue Gilligan: Newly released tracks from band member Christian Leuenberg Longy: An homage to Sam Cooke and two newly released tracks with the Gospel Trash Jimmie Bratcher: Spreading the Gospel & Blues and taking this episode out with 3 tracks Support sound artists from around the globe with sound money; boost, zap & share.

item.title: Blasting Borders
item.description: We're blasting borders on this episode with tracks from these artists: Lenze & De Baum Christian Leuenberg Joe Martin Nathan Abbott Temples Vicious Clay Monkey Robot War Deez Laughs Sakrecoer You can support sound artists with sound money on this value for value music podcast. Boost, zap, share and support. Sidenote: I will decide when a scheduled episode will come out on a specific day(maybe), for now, enjoy the music :)

item.title: Hail To The Horns
item.description: Two For Tunestr "Hail To The Horns" featuring these value for value artists: Bonus Intro New Artist: Jaded Jester Mellow Cassette Matt Finlay Steve Thorne Trifecta of Live tracks for Longy Liotia Please support the artists with a message, boost or zap and by sharing the episode.

item.title: Digital Disk
item.description: Two For Tunestr "Digital Disk" featuring these value-4-value artists: Zemar Red Crow Joe Johnny Delagrange TJ Wong Edwin Wiliamson Frankie Peroni Tamper You can support these artists with a boost, zap & message and by sharing the episode.

item.title: Two For Tuesday "Its Alive"
item.description: EP. 42 Two For Tuesday "Its Alive" All live tracks featuring these value-4-value music artist's: Bonus Intro: "Healing Hands" live at the Railway by Longy Theo Katzman The Doerfels Strange Love Justin Lantrip Longy Please support these V4V artists with a boost, message & by sharing this episode.

item.title: Swivel Heads
item.description: EP. 41 "Swivel Heads" Intro Song: "Take A Break" by Fentlay Mid-show track: "Waste Chop" by Crow Joe Outro track: "Blue Jeans" by Sam Means Chessboard Pawns The Epstein propaganda machine Bitcoin "Boot-lickers & hypocrites" El Salvador's criminal system Consequences of actions Nothing is new We also talk about music...shocker!

item.description: Ep. 40 Two For Tuesday "Parallel Playlist" featuring these Value-4-Value artist's: Nogards After 3 AM Delta OG Gauge 44 Kover You can support these artist's with a boost, message & by sharing the episode.

item.title: Two For Tuesday "Out Of Order"
item.description: Ep. 39 Two For Tuesday "Out Of Order" featuring these value for value music artists: Prosperous Soul: Golden Ray & Cheap Deception The Velvicks: Somebody Stop Me & Get Away The Retrograde: Next To You & On A String The Trusted: Arkansas live Satellite Spotlight MOOKY: Ultra Low live Satellite Spotlight The Fifty Four Plates: Devil In Me & Lost You can support the value for value artist's with a boost, zap & message.

item.title: Cowbells & Boots and Other Things
item.description: Ep. 38 Cowbells & Boots and Other Things On this episode, Bubba & Silvie discuss: Sports Life, death & regrets Bitcoin Drama On the second half of this episode, Bubba picks some tracks by these value-4-value artist's: Jessica Lynne Witty Sara Jade Luca Maddy Joe Martin Intro & Outro by: Sir TJ The Wrathful from Wrath Of Banjo Mid-show track: Good Enough by Nathan Abbott

item.title: Two For Tuesday "Exposure Therapy"
item.description: Ep 37. Two For Tuesday "Exposure Therapy" featuring these V4V music artist's: Fable Big Awesome Red Arrow Highway Matt Finlay A Cold Place Nowhere IROH Longy You can support these independent V4V musicians with a BOOST & a message!

item.description: Ep. 36 "Two For Tuesday (The Block)" featuring: Coal Bed Cheap Suit Edwin Williamson Corey Keller Ben Jonesy Jones Middle Season Riot In Progress Support these value-4-value artist's with a boost, message and by sharing. That's what music is meant for :-)

item.title: Two For Tuesday
item.description: Ep. 33 Two For Tuesday V4V Music Edition Featuring: Longy The Greensands The Retrograde Johnny Delagrange Ben P Williams MOOKY POLANKSKI Support these value-for-value music artists with a BOOST OR A ZAP!

item.title: Tune Out The Noise
item.description: Ep. 32 "Tune Out The Noise" Bubba & Silvie enter the music value-verse with an episode dedicated solely to decentralized music from these v4v artist's: The Velvicks All Kings All Poets Joe Martin Longy The Trusted Late Night Special MOOKY FM Rodeo Strange Love Edwin Williamson Local Zero Two Weeks To Nashville POLANSKI And an original acoustic from Bubba
